location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Farish, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a report on a sample of cotton.In enclosure copy of a letter sent to George Drury Esquire, Export Warehouse Keeper, from Dhackji Dadaji and [Jamji ] Cowasjee in Bombay on 19 April 1813, stating that the Persian Cotton sample is of good and merchantable quality.
